The team hails from the HFT world and is fed up with the state of blockchain exchanges. BitBridge can match consistently at hundreds of thousands of orders per second, enabling market makers to provide meaningful liquidity simultaneously across many products. We take performance, reliability, and security seriously and now we're building a real crypto exchange platform to fintech standards. Join us.
